A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star Wars movie ever! They ruined the character of Luke Skywalker completely. The writing was atrocious as well as the narrative. I left the theater completely let down. I was excited to see it and I had not tried to predict anything. Episode 4 was my first movie seeing as a child so I have grew up with Star Wars. Also the continued onslaught against the men in the movie was so demeaning. I am tired of Hollywood portraying men as mindless buffoons. Over 50% of the fans that I have read their reviews also hate it yet the critics reviews are stellar. What the hell? Are they even fans of Star Wars?
